info.author: Very Good Security
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
# VGS Client

Used to configure an existing vault.

# Installation

Latest version
```
pip install vgs-cli
```

# Authentication

Authentication is done using dashboard credentials (username/password + MFA).

For authentication only:
```
vgs authenticate
```

Note that authenticated session expires in 5 minutes. After that you'll be asked to re-authenticate.

# Usage

```
vgs --tenant=tnteipi8liw --environment=sandbox route --dump-all > tnteipi8liw.routes
vgs --tenant=tnteipi8liw --environment=sandbox route --sync-all < tnteipi8liw.routes
vgs --tenant=tnt3lmevlos --environment=live route --create-all < tnteipi8liw.routes
```
info.name: zinovii-vgs-cli

Used to configure an existing vault.

Installation

Authentication

Authentication is done using dashboard credentials (username/password + MFA).

For authentication only:

vgs authenticate

Note that authenticated session expires in 5 minutes. After that you'll be asked to re-authenticate.

Usage

vgs --tenant=tnteipi8liw --environment=sandbox route --dump-all > tnteipi8liw.routes
vgs --tenant=tnteipi8liw --environment=sandbox route --sync-all < tnteipi8liw.routes
